description.narrative: Based in the Southern Province of Zambia, this project aims at promoting sustainable access to safe water & adequate sanitation facilities to rural marginalised communities. It targets a total of 17,750 beneficiaries to safe water & 22,860 beneficiaries to sanitation.The project will also target 29,718 people with hygiene promotion for improved hygiene behaviours & practices.

activity-date.narrative: Date that project is due to end

mailing-address.narrative: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
